title: Google will allow Pixel users to opt-out of Android Beta Program without wiping device
content:
Android Beta Program allows Pixel users to try out new software releases ahead of their official release. Up until now, if you wanted to migrate to the final, public release at the end of the beta program, you had no choice but to wipe your phone. Thankfully, that won’t be the case moving forward. Yesterday,

The post Google will allow Pixel users to opt-out of Android Beta Program without wiping device appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In the future, Pixel owners running the beta software will be able to opt-out to the official Android release without wiping their device.
